oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1911/12 Grain Elevators in Western Canada
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Storie, Dale
Davoodi, Danoosh
Laliberte, L.W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The file contained in this study is composed of .csv files related to a series of xsl transformation performed on OCR scans of the 1911/12 List of licensed elevators and warehouses in the Manitoba Grain Inspection Division to generate the .csv from file. The code utilized in the xsl transformation can be found on GitHub.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Grain Elevators
Prairie Provinces
Alberta
Saskatchewan
Manitoba
